features.situation: 对于从心理震慑中恢复的 IQ 检定

53490daa-9169-4c26-9fa0-5a8b71d2be3e.notes: FP 回复速度加倍（魔法、 异能带来的损失则不被减免）

e5b3ce82-a17d-464b-91a3-4bd760e8122c.notes: FP 回复速度加倍；失去 FP 的速度减半（魔法、异能带来的损失则不被减免）

features.situation: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

e92e7f43-2148-48b4-ae31-369319132812.notes: 在受伤后不会陷入休克

f48c56bf-5222-493e-9b57-a10d2f09e994.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

9bdba27d-bced-4ffd-b0f4-03a449330283.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

features.situation: to HT rolls to avoid harm from failure of covered skills
to @One turn of detailed combat actions@

4a961f0e-52f5-4397-ae36-f998a0aceb34.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

features.situation: to HT rolls to avoid harm from failure of covered skills
in all but the most solemn of situations

c9da0d06-a5a9-4231-a160-a9f99bef6b89.name: Vow (Own no more than what can be carried)
